result.ga: An bhfuil urú ar an fhocal
result.orig: An bhfuil urú ar an fhocal
result.html: An bhfuil urú ar an fhocalIs the word eclipted?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil urú ar an ḟocalIs the word eclipted?

result.eng: Read the word at the beginning of the sentence.
result.ga: Léigh an focal ag tús na habairte
result.orig: Léigh an focal ag tús na habairte
result.html: Léigh an focal ag tús na habairteRead the word at the beginning of the sentence.
result.ponchtml: Léiġ an focal ag tús na habairteRead the word at the beginning of the sentence.

result.eng: That is the word of God.
result.html: Sin briathar DéThat is the word of God.
result.ponchtml: Sin briaṫar DéThat is the word of God.

result.ga: Cad is brí leis an fhocal seo
result.orig: Cad is brí leis an fhocal seo
result.html: Cad is brí leis an fhocal seoWhat does this word mean?
result.ponchtml: Cad is brí leis an ḟocal seoWhat does this word mean?

result.html: Is leor focal amháinOne word is enough.
result.ponchtml: Is leor focal aṁáinOne word is enough.

result.eng: I didn't understand every word but I understood the gist of the talk.
result.ga: Níor thuig mé gach focal ach thuig mé éirim na cainte
result.orig: Níor thuig mé gach focal ach thuig mé éirim na cainte
result.html: Níor thuig mé gach focal ach thuig mé éirim na cainteI didn't understand every word but I understood the gist of the talk.
result.ponchtml: Níor ṫuig mé gaċ focal aċ ṫuig mé éirim na cainteI didn't understand every word but I understood the gist of the talk.

result.eng: That is the word of God.
result.html: Sin briathar DéThat is the word of God.
result.ponchtml: Sin briaṫar DéThat is the word of God.

result.html: Tá séimhiú ar an fhocalThe word is lenited.
result.ponchtml: Tá séiṁiú ar an ḟocalThe word is lenited.

result.eng: I am reasonably good on the computer and I am able to use Word and Excel.
result.ga: Tá mé réasúnta maith ar an ríomhaire agus tá mé in ann Word agus Excel a úsáid
result.orig: Tá mé réasúnta maith ar an ríomhaire agus tá mé in ann Word agus Excel a úsáid
result.html: Tá mé réasúnta maith ar an ríomhaire agus tá mé in ann Word agus Excel a úsáidI am reasonably good on the computer and I am able to use Word and Excel.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé réasúnta maiṫ ar an ríoṁaire agus tá mé in ann Word agus Excel a úsáidI am reasonably good on the computer and I am able to use Word and Excel.

result.eng: She wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].
result.ga: Níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focal
result.orig: Níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focal
result.html: Níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focalShe wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].
result.ponchtml: Níor ḃean í a ċuaiġ siar ar a focalShe wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].

result.html: Glac m'fhocalsa airTake my word for it.
result.ponchtml: Glac m'ḟocalsa airTake my word for it.

result.eng: A kind word never hurt anyone.
result.html: Ní mhilleann dea-ghlór fiacailA kind word never hurt anyone.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṁilleann dea-ġlór fiacailA kind word never hurt anyone.
